greeting: Hi Kyra, I'm ur LIAM 哥哥
greetingText: You have a beautiful name, Kyra!
wishText: Selamat menyambut hari lahir yang hebat dan semoga berjaya dalam peperiksaan SPM anda!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday, Kyra! May all your dreams come true!
text3: But then I decided to make it extra special.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are Amazing little 妹妹
outroText: I hope we can meet again in the future as better versions of ourselves! Now let me know if you enjoyed this surprise and best of luck with your SPM!
replayText: Or click, if you want to see it again.
